movies.title: Elijah
movies.plot: Ahab, a great king of the Israelites, has fallen under the spell of Jezebel, a daughter of the King of the Sidonians. He has rejected the Israelites' God and embraced Jezebel's religion: the worship of the idol Baal. At Jezebel's command, Ahab has ordered the execution of the prophets of Israel, replacing them with Baal's false prophets. But one man, Elijah, filled with power of the true God, directly challenges Ahab and Jezebel. He pronounces God's curse. " No rain will fall on Israel until the people reject Baal and return to God. As the God of Israel liveth no rain shall fall until I call on the Lord to deliver it." God commands Elijah to escape to the desert in the East, where God provides water and food from Heaven for His Prophet. Elijah longs to return to Israel, to save his people. But he is obedient to God. God commands Elijah to go and show himself to Ahab. Elijah tells Ahab to gather the prophets of Baal and meet him on Mount Carmel, where sacrifices are to be placed on two...

biography.bio: Gregory Snegoff was born on June 22, 1955 in Santa Monica, California, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Misery (1990), Wicked City (1987) and Glengarry Glen Ross (1992). He is married to Fiorella Capuano. He was previously married to Lisa Michelson.
biography.name: Gregory Snegoff

biography.bio: Victor Humphries is an actor, known for Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Victor Humphries

biography.bio: Ray Porter is an actor and casting director, known for Almost Famous (2000), Argo (2012) and The Runaways (2010).
biography.name: Ray Porter

biography.bio: Paul O'Connor is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Paul O'Connor

biography.bio: Jillian Crane was born on November 23, 1966 in Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA. She is an actress and producer, known for Election (1999), Great Kills Road (2009) and The Great New Wonderful (2005).
biography.name: Jillian Crane

biography.bio: Phil Hubbard is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Phil Hubbard

biography.bio: Johnathon Toppo is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Clandestiny (1996).
biography.name: Johnathon Toppo

biography.bio: Dennis Ressio is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Dennis Ressio

biography.bio: David Kelly is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: David Kelly

biography.bio: Matthew Best was born in June 1980 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA. He is an actor, known for The Paper Brigade (1996), Beyond Suspicion (1993) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Matthew Best

biography.bio: Siobhan Kelley is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Siobhan Kelley

biography.name: John Wencel

biography.bio: Daniel A. Keeler is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and The Joseph Smith Story (1988).
biography.name: Daniel A. Keeler
